page.title: 20GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: Some of the games played by children in our area are Hide and Seek, Tick, Stuck in the Mud, British Bulldog, and Three Bad Eggs. Some need equipment like bats and balls, but most just need players. {Hide and Seek}is still the most popular. One player, chosen to be 'man' counts, while the other players hide. The player who is 'man' then tries to find the others. When a hiding player is found, both race back to base. If 'man' gets back first, he shouts "one,two,three " and the player's name. If the player gets there first, he/she shouts "one,two, three,got my own dead". The first player caught is 'man' next time. The last player can shout "blue bottle" and then 'man' must be 'man' again. Lisa Spencer aged 14.
